import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { featuredProject = { name: "Dynamic HRMS Management System", description: `A full-scale Human Resource Management System (HRMS) designed for enterprise automation â€” managing attendance, payroll, leave, recruitment, performance, and employee lifecycle under one unified platform. The system enables real-time data synchronization between HR, Payroll, and Management dashboards, ensuring transparency and efficiency across all departments. Key features include automated attendance tracking, policy-based payroll computation, dynamic leave configuration, department-level analytics, and custom workflow approvals â€” all integrated into a responsive interface built with Angular and PHP (CodeIgniter).`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL", "CodeIgniter"], link: "https://your-hrms-demo-link.com" }; projects = [ { name: "UbiCRM â€” Customer Relationship Management", description: `UbiCRM is a multi-tenant CRM platform designed to help sales teams efficiently manage leads, deals, and customer relationships through automation, analytics, and real-time insights. As the Lead Full Stack Developer, I designed and optimized both the frontend and backend systems using Angular and AdonisJS. I developed a modular CRM architecture covering Leads, Deals, Activities, and Reports, while implementing RESTful APIs and optimizing SQL queries to improve backend performance by 45%. The platform includes a multi-organization structure ensuring complete data isolation and security. I integrated Highcharts.js for dynamic sales analytics and interactive dashboards, and enhanced system security through token-based authentication and encrypted identifiers. The result was a scalable, high-performance CRM with an improved user experience and strong data reliability.`, techStack: ["Angular", "AdonisJS", "MySQL", "Highcharts.js"], link: "https://your-crm-demo-link.com" }, { name: "Automatic Email & Notification System", description: "Developed a robust email/notification system for automated employee communication and alerts.", techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], link: "#" }, { name: "Employee Dashboard Analytics", description: "Created analytics dashboards for employee performance, attendance, and department insights.", techStack: ["Angular", "Chart.js", "REST API"], link: "#" }, { name: "UAE Leave Policy Engine", description: "Implemented rule-based leave logic for UAE policies â€” handling fiscal years, probation, and multiple service periods.", techStack: ["AdonisJS", "Luxon", "MySQL"], link: "#" } ]; }
